dialogue.introduction: Hello~! Kagerou-class destroyer, Maikaze! I'm not good in gloomy atmospheres!
dialogue.library_intro: Kagerou-class destroyer Maikaze! From Midway to the Southern Operations, I continued to dance across the battlefield. I'm good friends with Nowaki, a fellow Kagerou-class. When Truk Island was attacked, I almost made it.
dialogue.secretary1: Go~od morning! Wait, what time is it? Ah, I't doesn't m~atter!
dialogue.secretary3: O~h, the Admiral's in high spirits? Why don't we have a dance~?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral~ come and dance with me~!
dialogue.wedding: This is something I can only say to you, Admiral... truthfully, I can't help being scared... so I distract myself by dancing... But, with the Admiral by my side, everything is alright... can I stay close to you some more...?
dialogue.equipment1: You know, I'm getting too strong!
dialogue.equipment2: Remodeled ships are hu~ge!... just kidding.
dialogue.supply: I can dance some more now!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I danced too much~... Thanks for the full-body massage~
dialogue.return_from_sortie: My elite fleet has come back to port~!
dialogue.battle_start: Okay! Let's have a magnificent dance!
dialogue.night_battle: Right there, a big jump and turn!
dialogue.mvp: Admiral!... will you dance with me the next time too?
dialogue.minor_damaged2: No... I can't dance well now...
dialogue.moderately_damaged: This... If I dance, you'll see it!
dialogue.sunk: Where's... Nowaki? Help me~. I hate it... I hate sinking!
dialogue.white_day_2015: Ah, you are giving this to Maikaze? Thank you Admiral! I'm very happy~ Come on, let's dance!
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, today is a nice, an important day. Let's dance with Maikaze, now, One, Two
dialogue.early_summer_2015: It's going to be summer soon, huh, Admiral? What dance should I dance for summer? Hmm, what should I do... Admiral, what do you think?
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Summer has arrived~. Alright, one, two-! Ah, Katori! Shall we dance together again?
dialogue.fall_2015: Nowacchi, Nowacchi, autumn's here~. Which means delicious sweet potatoes. Ah, but you gotta watch your weight!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Admiral, it's Christmas, Christmas! Let's dance, shall we? One-two, one-two! Ahaha!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year, Admiral. This new year too, dance with Maikaze, okay?
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun, eh? Alright~ I shall be the demon! One-two one-two~♪ Heheh, you can't hit me~♪

hourly.0200: 2 A.M, huh~. About time to sleep, yeah?
hourly.0300: It's 3 A.M. Your skin's going to get bad, probably~
hourly.0400: 4 A.M, Admiral~ It's almost really morning, you know~
hourly.0600: It's Morning! It's 6 A.M.! Admiral, let's prepare breakfast, okay?
hourly.0800: It's now 8 A.M! Let's do our best today too!
hourly.0900: 9 o'clock. Maikaze wants to dance soo~n.
hourly.1000: It's 10 A.M. It's a nice wind, yes?
hourly.1100: It's 11 A.M! I've been getting hungry~ maybe~....
hourly.1300: It's 1 P.M. You have to move after eating, come on, a-one-two!
hourly.1600: It's 4 P.M. Just about evening, right?
hourly.1800: It's 6 P.M! What should be do for dinner? I think that something like cutlet would be great~!
hourly.1900: It's 7 P.M! Admiral, it's Dinner time! Work, Kancolle, take a break!
hourly.2100: Maikaze's 9 P.M. announcement. It's almost night battle time!
hourly.2200: 10 P.M! Night-dancing time. Going to a night battle?
hourly.2300: It's now 11 P.M.~. Admiral, it's okay to take a break soon, yeah?
